Package com.codewithej.realestateapi.service

Class ClientServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.codewithej.realestateapi.service.ClientServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientService
@Service public class ClientServiceImpl extends Object implements ClientService
Implementation of the ClientService interface.

Handles business logic for client operations, including CRUD functionalities and relationships with agents and properties. Utilizes ClientRepository, AgentRepository, and PropertyRepository for data access.
